attributes.review: i was going to download this app in order to keep up with our orange!🍊💕but it took TWENTY MINUTES TO DOWNLOAD 😤and THEn when it finally loaded! 🙄get this! it asked for my phone number so he can spam call me!!🤯😡 I HATE SPAM CALLS!! 🤬then it proceeded to glitch and my phone📱 CRASHED!!!! 😵🤧ive now deleted it but im afraid my phone might have a cheeto-y virus now!! ugh😖

attributes.title: Very professional

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our wonderful president, as any self respecting American would 🇺🇸❤️. Sadly, as soon as I opened it, my phone burst into flames??? 🔥 💥??? I then began to hear satanic chanting 👿 and vague organ music 🎶. Various items in my room began to rise ominously. Thankfully, I was able to stop the chanting by deleting the app. I am shocked/disappointed. 😡😡
attributes.title: Worst app ever???!! 🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: This App is excellent! I can get caught up on missed Trump events. Here there is information that the mainstream media does not report.
attributes.title: Great App

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our president however the opening screen was a picture of trumps penis ( I had screen mirroring on my 65in tv so everyone including the children saw it) I’ve had uncontrollable diarrhea ever since then I’m starting to understand why his wife’s favorite show is how to get away with murder

attributes.review: So I recently downloaded this app to respect our deceased Cheeto president RIP😔and when they asked me for my phone number, a scary orange🟠monster🧟‍♂️jumped out of my screen and pulled my hair until I told him I would worship him!! ⚰️He pulled out so much hair and skin that I have to get scalp surgery!💉 This app is cursed, don’t show to your kids😭
attributes.title: I have to get scalp surgery!!🧚

I hate the app and I had to get a brand new phone😡 hopefully America can get brand new people too! anyways don’t get this app and if you do rate it 1 star❤️ and remember Manny Flag 2020💛🖤go sign petitions

attributes.review:
